ValidationRule.description: Validate if there are duplicate cost value at BG level or BU level when introduced manually - March 2021
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( PSR_Automatically_Calc_Estimated_Cost__c == false, OR( PSR_Cost_BG_NI__c == PSR_Cost_BG_MN__c, PSR_Cost_BG_NI__c == PSR_Cost_BG_CNS__c, PSR_Cost_BG_CNS__c == PSR_Cost_BG_MN__c, PSR_Cost_BU_NI_FN__c == PSR_Cost_BU_NI_IPRTG__c, PSR_Cost_BU_NI_FN__c == PSR_Cost_BU_NI_OPTICS__c, PSR_Cost_BU_NI_IPRTG__c == PSR_Cost_BU_NI_OPTICS__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot enter the same amount for costs for different BGs or BUs
